translations.translation: They turned to face each other in mutual accusation.
Then they started blaming one another,
Then they began to reproach one another.
Some of them started to blame others.
So they came towards each other, blaming.
Then they turned one against another, blaming.
Then some of them advanced against others, blaming each other.
And they advanced one upon another, blaming each other.
Then some of them drew near unto others, self-reproaching.
Then they began to heap reproaches on each other.
Then they turned to each other reproaching
Then they turned to one another, blaming each other.
Then they turned, one against another, in reproach.
Then they turned, one against another, in blaming.
And they came blaming one another.
Then they turned to one another, blaming one another.
Then they approached one another, blaming each other.
[68:30] They then turned to one another, blaming each other.
(Then some of them drew near unto others, self-reproaching) reproaching one another.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعد وقوع الواقعة { فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَلاَوَمُونَ } [القلم: 30] يعني: يلوم بعضهم بعضاً، فإنهم منهم من أنكر، ومنهم من استصوب، ومنهم من أشار، ومنهم من سكت
